statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age < 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000')
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(patient_gender) > 1 ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_date FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_notes FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_type LIKE '%medication%'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, treatment_type FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type, treatment_description FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT professional_name, professional_title FROM MedicalProfessionals WHERE professional_specialty = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT professional_name, professional_specialty FROM MedicalProfessionals ORDER BY professional_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, department FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, medicine_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, department FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, prescription_date, medicine_name, dosage, notes FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, phone_number, specialization, department, email FROM doctors WHERE department = 'Cardiology' AND specialization = 'Heart Disease Specialist';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty, therapist_location FROM therapists WHERE therapist_location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE therapist_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty, therapist_location FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialty = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, therapist_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN therapists ON appointments.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC LIMIT 5;
